about.title: Leng Narak
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer | UX/UI Designer | Educator
about.description: As a Full Stack Developer, UX/UI Designer, and Teacher, I have extensive experience in creating various projects and in education. I am committed to developing innovative digital experiences and sharing knowledge with others through technology and my various work.
